org.ambraproject.rhino.config

Class RhinoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.config.BaseConfiguration
      • org.ambraproject.rhino.config.RhinoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
@EnableTransactionManagement
public class RhinoConfiguration
extends BaseConfiguration
    Bean configuration for the application.

    This augments some other bean configurations located at src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/spring/appServlet/servlet-context.xml.
